short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google extension for Prolific to notify you when studies are available

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get notified when there are new studies on Prolific.
Extension works by checking when there are changes on Prolific tab title and there is a new study.
Extension doesn't directly interact with Prolific (doesn't reserve study, make calls to Prolific), so it is safe and fair to use
Notifies faster than official extension in most cases.
Need to have Prolific open for extension to work
For now extension is 100% free, might change in the future, based on generosity of donations.
Enjoy more studies and earn more money!
